WorkItem.Description:
Even if I make a brand spanking new save file with 5.0.4 I can never retrieve them.  Either Feral or Guardian saved files.

character name: Ashur  Server name: Thrall (US Alliance)

Here is the error.
== Version: 5.0.4.0 WPF ==

== Error Message ==
Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.
Parameter name: index

== StackTrace ==
at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentOutOfRangeException()
at Rawr.ItemSet.GenerateItemSetFromSavedString(String source)
at Rawr.Character.<LoadFromXml>b__30(String itemset)
at System.Collections.Generic.List1.ConvertAll[TOutput](Converter2 converter)
at Rawr.Character.LoadFromXml(String xml)

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Tried to open a character's new save file.
WorkItem.Summary: Cannot load up any saved character files.

Comments.Message: I'm coming back to WoW and RAWR from a few month absence, and I'm having exactly this problem.  I can load my old files fine, but as soon as I save them in my new 5.04, whether through the web version or the downloaded one, I receive this error.
